name: Quick-Change
description:
Quick-Change is a short narrative about a trans kid making new friends, getting a crush, getting in trouble, and joining the school musical in the extraordinarily gendered hell that is (private, christian) middle school. It's made for trans kids, gay kids, musical theater kids, private school kids, and anybody who was once one of those kids.

I made this in about a month to practice art and writing and to learn Renpy. It's more of a kinetic graphic novel than a game. It's fairly amateur, but I hope it's still enjoyable.

NOTES: 

As the game deals with such topics, there are non-graphic depictions of transphobia and homophobia.

There are three montages of full-screen images that dissolve into each other during the game. Unfortunately, if you click during a montage, you'll skip the whole thing. If you do click accidentally,  just click the 'back' button to return to the beginning of the montage.
